 We can use ZENODO to create a DOI link for GitHub.
 
## ZENODO Settings

To link a ZENODO with the GitHub we need:

 1. Flip the switch (select the repository and turn on the buttom)
 2. Create a release (go to GitHub and create a release, zenodo will automatically download a .zip and register a DOI)
 3. Get the badge (After the release, a DOI badge will appear next to the repository)
